purpose: Defines a generic container for flow content
tips: Often used with CSS classes to structure sections or layout.

purpose: Inline container for text or small elements
tips: Useful for styling part of text or grouping inline elements.

purpose: Defines a paragraph of text
tips: Browsers automatically add vertical spacing before and after paragraphs.

purpose: Defines the most important heading
tips: Use headings hierarchically (`h1` → `h6`) for structure and SEO.

purpose: Creates a hyperlink to another page or resource
tips: Always include `rel="noopener"` for external links for security.

purpose: Defines an unordered (bulleted) list
tips: Use `<li>` for each item; do not nest block elements inside directly.

purpose: Defines an ordered (numbered) list
tips: Use `type` attribute to change numbering style if needed.

purpose: Embeds an image in the document
tips: Always include descriptive alt text for accessibility.

purpose: Defines tabular data
tips: Use `<thead>`, `<tbody>`, `<tfoot>`, and `<th>` for semantic structure.

purpose: Collects user input for submission
tips: Always pair `<label>` elements with inputs for accessibility.

purpose: Defines interactive controls for user input
tips: Choose correct `type` for validation and UX; always pair with `<label>`.

purpose: Defines a clickable button
tips: Use `type="button"` or `type="submit"` depending on form behavior.

purpose: Embeds a video player
tips: Always provide multiple sources and a fallback message for accessibility.

purpose: Embeds an audio player
tips: Provide captions or transcripts for accessibility.

purpose: Used for rendering graphics via JavaScript
tips: Requires JS to draw; set width/height attributes to avoid scaling issues.

purpose: Represents a standalone section of content
tips: Use semantic tags to improve accessibility and SEO.

purpose: Represents a self-contained composition
tips: Good for blog posts, news, and similar content blocks.

purpose: Defines introductory content or navigational links
tips: Usually appears at the top of a page or section.

purpose: Defines footer for a page or section
tips: Typically contains authorship info, copyright, or navigation links.

purpose: Embeds another HTML document inside the page
tips: Always include a `title` attribute for accessibility.

purpose: Provides accessible labels for screen readers
tips: Use for interactive elements where visible text is insufficient.

purpose: Custom data attributes for storing private data
tips: Accessible via JavaScript with dataset property.

purpose: Provides metadata about the HTML document
tips: Place in `<head>`; useful for SEO, charset, viewport, and social tags.

purpose: Links external resources like stylesheets
tips: Must be placed in `<head>`; rel attribute defines resource type.
